SELECT companyCode,round(avg(promotion_possibility),1) as promotion_possibility, round(avg(welfare_pay),1) as welfare_pay, round(avg(work_life_balance),1) as work_life_balance, round(avg(corporate_culture),1) as corporate_culture,round(avg(management),1)as management FROM company_Score WHERE companyCode=#{companyCode} Group by companyCode
